meta.content: Laporte Public School, ISD #306, Laporte, MN, Laporte, Benedict, Guthrie, Lake George, Kabekona

meta.name: description
meta.content: The Laporte Public School Serving the communities of: Laporte - Benedict – Guthrie – Lake George – Kabekona. Our Mission: To enable our students to acquire the knowledge, skills, and values for a lifelong process of learning, growth, and responsible citizenship in an increasingly interdependent world.

Phone: (218) 224-2288
Fax: (218) 224-2905

div.addthis:title: Best High School Bronze Award
div.addthis:description: Laporte Secondary is recognized in the US News National Rankings and earned a bronze medal. Schools are ranked based on their performance on state-required tests and how well they prepare students for college.

div.addthis:title: Laporte School Mission Statement
div.addthis:description: The mission of Laporte School is to challenge all of our students to acquire the knowledge, skills, and values necessary for lifelong learning, growth, and responsible citizenship.

p.span: The mission of Laporte School is to challenge all of our students to acquire the knowledge, skills, and values necessary for lifelong learning, growth, and responsible citizenship.

a.addthis:title: Laporte School is Closed
a.addthis:description: Please note that our school is CLOSED to the public. If you are in need of assistance please call ...

div.p: Please note that our school is CLOSED to the public. If you are in need of assistance please call 218.224.2288 and you will be advised to either leave an item or pick one up in the ENTRYWAY of the school. For all of our safety, it is important that you DO NOT enter the building beyond the entryway.

a.addthis:title: Congratulations to Raina Erdmann for Being Selected to the Minnesota Honor Band.

span.strong: Congratulations to Raina Erdmann for Being Selected to the Minnesota Honor Band.

div.p: Mr. Jake Upton, band director at Laporte School, nominated Raina Erdmann for the Minnesota Honor Band. Mr. Upton nominates "students for this program who are hard working and are willing to face the challenge of learning music pieces in one day" and Raina's name quickly came to mind. Tomorrow, Feb. 25th, Raina and Mr. Upton will travel to the Uni...

a.addthis:title: Scholarship Opportunity For Those Wishing To Learn the Dakota/Ojibwe Language

span.strong: Scholarship Opportunity For Those Wishing To Learn the Dakota/Ojibwe Language

div.p:
Applicants will be asked to submit the following application materials on this form:
-Resume -Unofficial high school or college transcript. -400-word essay that describes your interest in learning the Dakota/Ojibwe language, how you will use this opportunity to the benefit of the Dakota/Ojibwe community AND how this scholarship would facilitate your academic and profession...
